column2: taxon name from the original source file
scientific or common name (we can accommodate either; common names will be translated to scientific names during the 'taxa translate' step)
TaxaID_orig translated to an ID that harmonizes differences across datasets (such as syntax, changes in nomenclature, misspellings, etc.). Used for the Great Plains BCG metric calculations
TRUE = TaxaID_orig is different from the OTU_BCG; FALSE = TaxaID_orig is the same as the OTU_BCG
